channel.title: Jobs on Noetic Nought
channel.description: Recent content in Jobs on Noetic Nought

item.title: Recurse Center, 2014-08-21
item.description: I added an additional view to xtab, to see all the pages that were killed, and reopen them, if you so choose. Also, cleaned up the api-diff project and renamed it to what-changed. Started thinking about building the GitHub organization dashboard, that I thought would be interesting to have, since the 1st or 2nd week of Hacker School. A bunch of awesome thursday presentations, and job fair and awesome food by Chef Warren!

item.title: Recurse Center, 2014-06-20
item.description: Fridays are optional in Hacker School, and people are given help with preparation for job interviews. This week’s exercise was a “know-your-language” type exercise and I decided to do it with Haskell, and confirmed the fact that I didn’t know it too well. :) I spent the afternoon writing the blog-post on OAuth2, and adding support for converting ditaa code blocks to png using Pygments. It may not have been the best use of time, but anyway…
